meta.name: description
meta.content: Ardmore City Schools serves K-12th grade students and is located in Ardmore, OK.

div.span: Check under "News & Announcements" to stay informed about what the District and Department of Education have to say about COVID-19

div.div: In partnership with parents and the community, the mission of Ardmore City Schools is to educate all students through an unconditional commitment to quality and high standards
A special meeting of the Ardmore Board of Education will be held virtually on April 22, 2020 at 12:00 p.m. The Agenda and Board Packet are available for your information!
Follow the link for more information!

Ardmore City Schools is offering a free meal to Ardmore students during the days that school would have been in session while we are following the mandatory school closure. Follow the link for more information!
Location: Ardmore Convention Center, 2401 N Rockford Rd, Ardmore, OK 73401, USA

div.div: IN PARTNERSHIP WITH PARENTS AND THE COMMUNITY, THE MISSION OF ARDMORE CITY SCHOOLS IS TO EDUCATE ALL STUDENTS THROUGH AN UNCONDITIONAL COMMITMENT TO QUALITY AND HIGH STANDARDS
